title: New plan for Colorado River is still murky as states pass by early deadline
description: Utah and six states are negotiating water sharing for the Colorado River, with a deadline set for February, but no firm agreement yet.
content: Utah and six states are negotiating water sharing for the Colorado River, with a deadline set for February, but no firm agreement yet.
